titles.title: A bill to authorize the use of off-highway vehicles in certain areas of the Capitol Reef National Park, Utah.
A bill to authorize the use of off-highway vehicles in certain areas of the Capitol Reef National Park, Utah.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.
Committee on Energy and Natural Resources Subcommittee on National Parks. Hearings held.

bill.summary: This bill makes the state law of Utah applicable to the use of motor vehicles (including off-highway vehicles) on the portions of each of Burr Trail Road, Cathedral Road, Hartnet Road, Highway 24, Notom Bullfrog Road, Polk Creek Road, Oil Ranch Road, and Baker Ranch Road that are located within the boundaries of the Capitol Reef National Park in Utah.
